thread.title: General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln

title: General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln
text:
General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln 2:27am IST - 01:34 
Cheerios cereal maker General Mills will buy Blue Buffalo Pet Products for nearly $8 billion to tap demand for natural pet food and offset falling sales for processed items. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Cheerios cereal maker General Mills will buy Blue Buffalo Pet Products for nearly $8 billion to tap demand for natural pet food and offset falling sales for processed items.
